docs.lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain has reached the semifinal of the clay-court Brazil Open, defeating Fabio Fognini of Italy 6-0, 7-6 (1).

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who livestreamed the fatal police shooting of her boyfriend during a traffic stop in Minnesota last year was charged Friday in a reported assault.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Denver judge has raised bail to $1 million cash for a Honduran man charged in a fatal hit-and-run to make sure he is not deported before the state case is resolved.

docs.lead_paragraph: The campaign chief of embattled presidential candidate Francois Fillon resigned on Friday, dealing another blow to the former prime minister who has seen party grandees quit his campaign one after the other in the past few days.

headline.print_headline: French Presidential Candidate Fillon's Campaign Chief Resigns

docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Fox wrote for all ages, offering closely observed portraits of loss and abandonment. It was terrain she knew all too well.

docs.lead_paragraph: The NCAA rules committee said Friday it wants to make it illegal for defenders to hurdle linemen to block a kick and to expand what constitutes a horse-collar tackle. It decided against tinkering with the targeting rule to eliminate the ejection penalty for some of the fouls.

headline.print_headline: NCAA: No Hurdling to Block Kicks; Status Quo for Targeting
headline.main: NCAA: No Hurdling to Block Kicks; Status Quo for Targeting

docs.lead_paragraph: Vice President Mike Pence joined House Speaker Paul Ryan on Friday in his Wisconsin hometown, promising during an invite-only speech that a replacement plan for the Affordable Care Act would come within days while dismissing recent protests at Republican town halls by people opposed to repealing it.

headline.print_headline: Pence Dismisses Town Hall Criticism During Wisconsin Stop

docs.lead_paragraph: A study that examined domesticated trees and plants, including in areas near archaeological sites, supports the idea that indigenous humans helped shape the forest.
